img_above_text:
# Cloudtreading Deer
Cloudtreading Deer is one of the main Yaoguai Chiefs you'll need to find in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). This two-phase fight will have you facing frost and poison, in order to get a key piece of Wukong's armor.
## How to Find Cloudtreading Deer
When you've beaten the third Poison Chief, head over to the start of the red trees. As you enter the clearing with the lightning, you'll find the next Keeper's Shrine on the left.

img_summary: The image depicts a misty landscape with striking red trees, set against a rocky terrain and distant mountains. This scene is likely part of the journey to find the Cloudtreading Deer, a significant Yaoguai Chief in Chapter 6 of "Black Myth: Wukong." The red trees mark the entrance to a clearing where players will encounter the Keeper's Shrine, essential for progressing in the game. The image serves as a visual guide to help players locate this area after defeating the third Poison Chief.
